name: retrieve_audio_file
description: This is a sub-function API for tool melrose_labs_voice_api. Tool description: The Voice API is used for text-to-speech, speech-to-text and inbound/outbound voice routing. The Voice API is part of the Voice Gateway from Melrose Labs. API description: Retrieve an audio file in MP3 format from a previously submitted text-to-speech conversion.

transactionid.description: The transaction ID for the previously submitted text-to-speech conversion.
